name: The Die of Many Things
description:
Synopsis

There is a single die that rolls unexpected things. The examiner has asked you to roll the die until the experiment is complete. Strange things start to happen the more you roll. Can you navigate the randomness, or become a slave to the will of the die?

Gameplay

The Die of Many Things is a short, single-player interactive text adventure where the rolls of a six-sided die determines where the story will end up. There are 4 primary endings and many more intertwining paths. The narrative can jump from dark to whimsical at the toss of a die! As well, many of the story elements are randomized, changing the story every time!

This game was made using Unity by Caleb Martin and Coleman Spears for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.
